entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
